rules: Rule1: If person Alpha violates legislation Beta, then person Alpha is compliant with legislation Beta.
Rule2: Either person Alpha violates legislation Beta or financial Zeta is legitimate.
Rule3: Whenever person Alpha consumes substance Eta, person Alpha is impaired.
Rule4: Either person Alpha consumes substance Eta or if person Gamma trades financial Zeta, person Alpha does not trade financial Zeta.
Rule5: Under the condition that platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta, financial Zeta is legitimate.
Rule6: Assuming that authority Delta regulates platform Epsilon, then should platform Epsilon be authorized, it follows that platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta.
Rule7: Either authority Delta regulates platform Epsilon or authority Iota regulates platform Epsilon.
Rule8: Whenever authority Iota regulates platform Epsilon, person Gamma operates platform Epsilon.
Rule9: Should platform Epsilon appeal, then either platform Epsilon is fined or platform Epsilon is not shutdown.
Rule10: If person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon, then in the event that person Alpha violates legislation Beta, person Alpha is not compliant with legislation Beta.
Rule11: Provided that person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon, then if person Alpha violates legislation Beta, person Alpha is not compliant with legislation Beta.
Rule12: Under the condition that authority Delta investigates person Alpha, either person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon or person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon.
Rule13: Either authority Delta investigates person Alpha or authority Delta investigates person Gamma.
Rule14: Whenever authority Delta investigates person Gamma, authority Delta sanctions person Alpha.
Rule15: If authority Delta sanctions person Alpha, then authority Delta sanctions person Gamma.
Rule16: Provided that authority Delta sanctions person Gamma, then either person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon or person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon.
Rule17: If it is not the case that should person Gamma operate platform Epsilon, then if platform Epsilon is authorized, platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta, then platform Epsilon is shutdown.
Rule18: In the event that financial Zeta is not legitimate, person Alpha trades financial Zeta.
facts: Fact1: Person Gamma trades financial Zeta.
Fact4: It is not the case that person Alpha is impaired.
Fact5: Platform Epsilon is not fined.
